About

I am Mike Key, a front end developer based in Clearwater, FL. I craft code for Wihp, climb mountains, read old books, lift heavy things, eat (mostly) paleo. Sold everything to travel the USA in an Airstream with my wife and daugther.

You can contact me via email or follow me on Twitter, Github.
